title: Check if Browser Tab Is Focused
description: In this lab, we will explore how to check if a browser tab is focused using JavaScript. We will make use of the Page Visibility API to determine whether the browser tab of the page is visible or hidden. This technique can be useful for optimizing the performance of web applications and providing a better user experience.

steps.title: Check if Browser Tab Is Focused

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
